#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REDRESS_START_DATE=#{redressStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REDRESS_END_DATE=#{redressEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FINISH_INTO = #{finshInfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIC_REPORT_INFO_KEY = #{dicReportInfoKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_REPORT_TYPE_KEY = #{dicReportTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_PASS_PORT_KEY = #{dicPassPortKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOME_PLACE = #{homePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY = #{dicMonitorGradeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_REGISTER_ID = #{dicRegisterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHORT_NUMBER = #{shortNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINISH_INTO1 = #{finshInfo1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO2 = #{finshInfo2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO3 = #{finshInfo3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO4 = #{finshInfo4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO5 = #{finshInfo5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO6 = #{finshInfo6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO7 = #{finshInfo7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO8 = #{finshInfo8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINISH_INTO9 = #{finshInfo9,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IFACE_SN = #{ifaceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINGER_FACE_TIME = #{fingerFaceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DIC_FIRST_REPORT_GET_KEY=#{dicFirstReportGetKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_FIRST_REPORT_TYPE_KEY=#{dicFirstReportTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id)

mapper.select:
select
from SF_CULPRIT t1 where t1.group_id in (select id from sys_group start with id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id=parent_id)

select a.sexCount count,t.value typeName,concat(to_char(round((a.sexCount/(select count(dic_Sex_Key) from SF_CULPRIT t1
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id)g where t1.group_id=g.id)))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percent from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.dic_Sex_Key) sexCount,t1.dic_Sex_Key sexKey from SF_CULPRIT t1
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.dic_Sex_Key) a on a.sexKey=t.key where t.parent_key='10000' and a.sexCount>0 and a.sexCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 18 then 1 else null end) as age18, concat(to_char(round((count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 18 then 1 else null end)/count(t.identification))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percent18, count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 45 and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 18 then 1 else null end) as age45, concat(to_char(round((count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 45 and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 18 then 1 else null end)/count(t.identification))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percent45, count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 60 and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 45 then 1 else null end) as age60, concat(to_char(round(( count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) < 60 and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 45 then 1 else null end)/count(t.identification))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percent60, count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 60 then 1 else null end) as ageUp, concat(to_char(round((count(case when (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')- t.born_year) >= 60 then 1 else null end)/count(t.identification))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percentUp, count(t.identification) as totalCount from ( select case when length(t1.identification) = 18 then substr(t1.identification, 7, 4) when length(t1.identification) = 15 then '19'||substr(t1.identification, 7, 2) end as born_year, t1.identification as identification from sf_culprit t1 and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id))t

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName,concat(to_char(round((a.penalTypeCount/(select count(c.DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY) from SF_CULPRIT_JUDGMENT c left join SF_CULPRIT t1 on c.CULPRIT_ID=t1.id
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id)g where t1.group_id=g.id)))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percent from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(j.DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY) penalTypeCount,j.DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT_JUDGMENT j left join SF_CULPRIT t1 on j.CULPRIT_ID=t1.id
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by j.DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='20000' and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.dicHklxCount count,t.value typeName,concat(to_char(round((a.dicHklxCount/(select count(DIC_HKLX_KEY) from SF_CULPRIT t1
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id)g where t1.group_id=g.id)))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percent from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_HKLX_KEY) dicHklxCount,t1.DIC_HKLX_KEY dicHklx from SF_CULPRIT t1
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_HKLX_KEY) a on a.dicHklx=t.key where t.parent_key='12000' and a.dicHklxCount>0 and a.dicHklxCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.crimeTypeCount count,t.value typeName,concat(to_char(round((a.crimeTypeCount/(select count(DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY) from SF_CULPRIT_JUDGMENT c left join SF_CULPRIT t1 on c.CULPRIT_ID=t1.id
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id)g where t1.group_id=g.id)))*100,2),'fm990.9999'),'%') percent from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(j.DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY) crimeTypeCount,j.DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY crimeType from SF_CULPRIT_JUDGMENT j left join SF_CULPRIT t1 on j.CULPRIT_ID=t1.id
and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by j.DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY) a on a.crimeType=t.key where t.parent_key='26000' and a.crimeTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select * from (select to_char(REDRESS_START_DATE,'yyyy') year,count(*) count from SF_CULPRIT t1 where t1.REDRESS_START_DATE is not null and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by to_char(REDRESS_START_DATE,'yyyy')) a where a.year>to_char(sysdate - interval '5' year,'yyyy') and a.year<=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') order by a.year asc

select CONCAT(replace(month,'-','年'),'月') as label,count from (select month,count(id) as count from (select to_char(REDRESS_START_DATE,'yyyy"-"mm') as month,t1.id from SF_CULPRIT t1 where t1.REDRESS_START_DATE is not null and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id)) group by month) a where a.month>=to_char(sysdate-interval'5'month,'yyyy-mm') and a.month<=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') order by a.month asc

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_HKLX_KEY) penalTypeCount,t1.DIC_HKLX_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT t1 where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_HKLX_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='12000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_HYZK_KEY) penalTypeCount,t1.DIC_HYZK_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT t1 where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_HYZK_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='11000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(j.DIC_RECEIVE_TYPE_KEY) penalTypeCount,j.DIC_RECEIVE_TYPE_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT_JUDGMENT j left join SF_CULPRIT t1 on j.CULPRIT_ID=t1.id where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by j.DIC_RECEIVE_TYPE_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='70000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(j.DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY) penalTypeCount,j.DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT_JUDGMENT j left join SF_CULPRIT t1 on j.CULPRIT_ID=t1.id where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by j.DIC_PENAL_TYPE_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='20000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(j.DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY) penalTypeCount,j.DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT_JUDGMENT j left join SF_CULPRIT t1 on j.CULPRIT_ID=t1.id where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by j.DIC_CRIME_TYPE_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='26000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_YZZMM_KEY) penalTypeCount,t1.DIC_YZZMM_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT t1 where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_YZZMM_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='65000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY) penalTypeCount,t1.DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT t1 where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='27000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_SEX_KEY) penalTypeCount,t1.DIC_SEX_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT t1 where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_SEX_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='10000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_WHCD_KEY) penalTypeCount,t1.DIC_WHCD_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT t1 where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_WHCD_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='19000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT

select a.areaCount count,t.areaname typeName from area t left join (select count(g.area) areaCount,g.area areaCode from SF_CULPRIT t1 left join SYS_GROUP g on t1.group_id=g.id where exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by g.area) a on a.areaCode=t.areacode where t.areacode like #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and a.areaCount>0 and a.areaCount is not null order by t.areacode

select a.penalTypeCount count,t.value typeName from SYS_DIC t left join (select count(t1.DIC_STATUS_KEY) penalTypeCount,t1.DIC_STATUS_KEY penalType from SF_CULPRIT t1 where t1.DIC_STATUS_KEY in ('13008','13010','13002','13006','13015','13016','13016','13003') and exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g where t1.group_id=g.id) group by t1.DIC_STATUS_KEY) a on a.penalType=t.key where t.parent_key='13000' and a.penalTypeCount>0 and a.penalTypeCount is not null order by t.DIC_SORT
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.REDRESS_END_DATE>sysdate and t.REDRESS_END_DATE<(sysdate+30)
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.REDRESS_START_DATE>trunc(sysdate,'mm')
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.REDRESS_END_DATE>(sysdate-1) and t.REDRESS_END_DATE<sysdate
select count(*) from SF_CULPRIT t where t.dic_status_key=#{dicStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
